entry.title: Saturday night: Clearing. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High 14.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High 14. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers late in the evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 40 gusting to 70 in the evening then diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 8 April 2023
